column1: * 1917 - J.R.R. Tolkien faces his third Medical Board
column2: and again his leave is extended.

column1: * 2014 - The Fall of Arthur is published in paperback.
* 2014 - Farmer Giles of Ham pocket edition is published.
* 2015 - Actor and singer Leonard Nimoy dies.

column2: Grishnákh leaves. Peregrin Took cuts his rope and drops his Elven brooches.

column1: ** The Three Hunters reach the west-cliff of Emyn Muil at sunrise and find the brooch.
** Frodo and Sam sleep at a cliff on the eastern Emyn Muil.
** Éomer against Théodens orders sets out from Eastfold about midnight to pursue the Orcs.Category:Datesde:27. Februarfi:27. helmikuuta
